id: Midterms Pose Investing Plight: ‘You Can’t Position’ for Events Like This
paragraph: November 17, 2018Investors around the U.S. are bracing for the unexpected heading into the midterm elections, wary of being caught wrong footed as many were after the 2016 presidential election, Brexit and other crucial votes over the years.Few are predicting that the outcome widely seen as most likely—Democrats winning the House and Republicans retaining control of the Senate—will fuel the type of violent price swings that came on the heels of President Trump’s victory.WSJ MembershipCustomer ServiceTools & FeaturesAdsMore
